```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)

```


# N-Back


```{r}

nback <- read.csv2("data/nback.csv", sep = ",", fileEncoding="UTF-8-BOM")

nback$groupe <- as.factor(nback$groupe)
nback$subject_id <- as.factor(nback$subject_id)
nback$part <- factor(nback$part, levels = c("2-back-pre", "2-back-post"))
nback$id_2_back <- as.factor(nback$id_2_back)
nback$trial_id <- as.factor(nback$trial_id)

nback[is.na(nback)] <- 0

nback <- nback %>%
  filter(subject_id != 13) # trop de no-input

nback_summary <- nback %>%
  group_by(groupe, part) %>%
  summarize_if(is.numeric, mean)

nback_transc <- nback %>%
  filter(groupe == "transc")

nback_control <- nback %>%
  filter(groupe == "control")

nback_summary


```

## Temps de réponse

```{r}

nback_rt <- nback

out_rt <- boxplot.stats(nback_rt$rt)$out


nback_rt <- nback_rt %>%
  filter(!rt %in% out_rt)

ggboxplot(nback_rt, x = "groupe", y = "rt", fill = "part")

```

```{r}

ggdensity(nback_rt, x = "rt", fill = "part", main = "Densité RT", facet.by = "groupe")

```
```{r}

ggqqplot(nback_rt, x = "rt", facet.by = c("groupe", "part"))

```

### Shapiro

```{r}

nback_rt %>%
  group_by(groupe, part) %>%
  shapiro_test(rt)

```



```{r}

ggbarplot(nback_rt, x = "groupe", y = "rt", fill = "part", position = position_dodge(0.8), add = "mean_sd", main = "RT moyens")

```

```{r}

nback_rt %>%
  group_by(groupe, part) %>%
  cor_test(rt)

```
